unnormalised: Boro, mhunnllear tum Differential Calculus vixim vichartat? Tem mulltah dor badalachea dara vixim asa, barem? Oxem chintat: tum Bangaloreant tumchi scooty choloytat ani tumaka zanna zai tum kitlem vegaan yetat tech kshanant. Tem derivative tumaka deta!
normalised: Bore, tumi Differential Calculus vixim vichartat? Tem asle mhanllear bodolachea dara vixim asat, barem? Oxem chint: tumi tumchi scooty Bangalore-ant choloitat ani ek khas kshannant tumi kitli vegan veltat tem tumkam kollonk zai. Tem ek derivative tumkam dita!

unnormalised: Dhorat tumaka ek function asa, y = f(x). Derivative, zaka dy/dx vo f'(x) mhuntat, tumaka sangta y kitlem bodlota x ant ekdom chonne badlak. Kalpana korat x mhunnllear vel ani y mhunnllear tumchem antar. dy/dx mhunnllear tech kshanachi tumchi speed! Ti average speed nhoi; ti tatkalik speed. Ek point (x, f(x)) aslear curve y=f(x) ak tangent line chalo chintat.
normalised: Man'num tumi ek function asa, y mhonnllear f of x. Derivative, zacher d y divided by d x vo f prime of x mhonnun bhovkertenh likhtat, tumkam sangta y kitlo bodlota x-ant ek lhan, lhan bodlache khatir. Chintnum x mhonnllear vel ani y mhonnllear tumchem antar. d y divided by d x mhonnllear tea kshannachi tumchi gat! Ti osri gat nhui; ti totkalik gat. Vakra y mhonnllear f of x-k ek dilelea bindu x comma f of x-ant tangent line-chi dhali chintat.

unnormalised: Atam, kaim mulbhoot niyam shikonk zai. Power rule mukhya asa: y = x^n aslear, dy/dx = n*x^(n-1). Udahornnak, y = x^2 aslear, dy/dx = 2x. Dusro mahatvacho niyam trigonometric functions samil asa. sin(x) ch derivative cos(x) asa, ani cos(x) ch derivative -sin(x) asa. Uprant, nischit, amchea kodden product rule ani quotient rule astaat je don functions u(x) ani v(x) che product ani quotient che differentiating sambhalltat. Product rule (uv)' = u'v + uv' deta ani quotient rule (u/v)' = (u'v - uv')/v^2 deta. He niyam mahatvache aani tumaka online samadhanacho zaito prosn mellttolo.
normalised: Aata, shikhonchek kiteak tori niyom asat. Power rule mukhya asa: zaka y mhonnllear x to the power of n, tenna d y divided by d x mhonnllear n times x to the power of n minus one. Udahoronnakhatir, zaka y mhonnllear x squared, tenna d y divided by d x mhonnllear two x. Dusro mukhel niyom trigonometric functions-chea vixim asa. Sine of x-chem derivative cosine of x asa, ani cosine of x-chem derivative minus sine of x asa. Magir, boreponnan, amkam product rule ani quotient rule asat zacher don functions u of x ani v of x-che product ani quotient-chem differentiating sambhalltat. Product rule dita u v prime mhonnllear u prime v plus u v prime ani quotient rule dita u divided by v prime mhonnllear u prime v minus u v prime divided by v squared. He niyom mukhya asat ani tumi online-ant solutations-chim bhovik problem sodun kaddunk shaktat.

unnormalised: Differential calculus sogllekodden vaparta. Physicsant, to gati ani speed vaporonk madad karta. Economicsant, to faido uttam korunk madad karta. Engineeringant, to rachnank design korunk madad karta. Udahornnak, zata area A eka circleacho radius r sarkeo bodolta, mhunnllear A=πr^2, magir dA/dr = 2πr. Mhunnllear, r = 5 cm aslear, dA/dr = 10π cm^2/cm. To optimization prosnan khatir ekdom madadgari zaunk xakta, zoxe production cost kami korunk.
normalised: Differential calculus soglle kade vaprun veltat. Physics-ant, gat ani toron sangonchek tem modot korta. Economics-ant, profit otimate korunk tem modot korta. Engineering-ant, structures design korunk tem modot korta. Udahoronnakhatir, zaka ek circle-chi area A radius r-ant bodlota, mhonnllear A mhonnllear pi r squared, tenna d A divided by d r mhonnllear two pi r. Bore, zaka r mhonnllear five centimeter, d A divided by d r mhonnllear ten pi centimeter squared per centimeter. Tem optimization problems-khatir khup modotik zatat, mhonnllear production cost-chem minimization-khatir.

unnormalised: Mhunnllear, sadhna karat, ani tum Differential Calculus chea vicharanchea adhipati zatole. Shubhechha! Tumchea NCERT pustokanche zaite prosn sadhnak yaad dovrat. Tanntun S.L. Loney hem pustak mulbhut vichar samzon ghenk ek uttam strot asa.
normalised: Bore, practicing rakhun, ani tumi differential calculus-chea vicharancher prabhoot zatole. Shubhechha! Tumchea N-C-E-R-T pustokantle bhovik problems-chi practicing korunk yad rakhum. Ani, S.L. Loney-chem pustak ek uttam sadhan asa adharit vicharancher somzonchek.
